hasEllipsizedText().Description: Matches TextView elements having ellipsized text. If text is too long to fit into a TextView, it can be either ellipsized ('Too long' shown as 'Too l…' or '… long') or cut off ('Too long' shown as 'Too l'). Though acceptable in some cases, usually indicates bad user experience.

hasMultilineText().Description: Matches TextView elements having multiline text.

ClassDesc: A collection of hamcrest matches to detect typical layout issues.
